Li Li.name: Healing Brew
Li Li.description: Heal lowest Health ally (prioritizing Heroes) for 196 (+4% per level) Health.

Li Li.name: Cloud Serpent
Li Li.description: Summon a Cloud Serpent on an allied Hero that attacks nearby enemies for 25 (+4% per level) damage per attack. Lasts for 8 seconds.

Li Li.name: Blinding Wind
Li Li.description: Throw a cloud of Blinding Wind at the 2 nearest enemies (prioritizing Heroes), dealing 140 (+4% per level) damage. Affected targets miss all Basic Attacks for the next 2 seconds.

Li Li.name: Jug of 1,000 Cups
Li Li.description: Rapidly tosses brew to the most injured nearby allies within 10 range, restoring 1632 (+4% per level) Health over 6 seconds.

Li Li.name: Water Dragon
Li Li.description: Li Li channels for 2 seconds, summoning a Water Dragon that hits the nearest enemy Hero within 12 range and all enemies near them, dealing 318 (+4% per level) damage and slowing their Movement Speed by 70% for 4 seconds.

Li Li.name: Fast Feet
Li Li.description: Upon taking damage, gain 10% Movement Speed for 1 second.

1.name: Conjurer's Pursuit
1.description: Quest: Gathering Regeneration Globes increases your Mana Regeneration by 0.1 per second, up to 2.5 per second.  Reward: After gathering 25 Globes, also increase your maximum Mana by 100.

1.name: Pro Toss
1.description: Increases the range of Healing Brew by 30%.

1.name: Timeless Creature
1.description: Increases the duration of Cloud Serpent by 50%.

4.name: Healing Ward
4.description: Activate to place a ward on the ground that heals allies in an area for 2% of their maximum Health every second for 10 seconds.

4.name: Lingering Blind
4.description: Increases the duration of Blinding Wind by 50%.

4.name: Mass Vortex
4.description: Increases the number of enemies hit by Blinding Wind from 2 to 4.

4.name: Mending Serpent
4.description: Cloud Serpent heals the friendly unit for 22 (+4% per level) Health each time it attacks.

7.name: Cleanse
7.description: Activate to make target ally Unstoppable for 1 second. Cannot be cast on yourself.

7.name: Lightning Serpent
7.description: Cloud Serpent's attacks bounce to 3 nearby enemy targets, dealing 14 (+4% per level) damage each.

7.name: Pitch Perfect
7.description: After casting Healing Brew, its cost is reduced by 10 Mana for 6 seconds.  This effect does not stack.

7.name: The Good Stuff
7.description: Healing Brew heals for an additional 60 (+4% per level) Health over 6 seconds.

10.name: Jug of 1,000 Cups
10.description: Rapidly tosses brew to the most injured nearby allies within 10 range, restoring 1632 (+4% per level) Health over 6 seconds.

10.name: Water Dragon
10.description: Li Li channels for 2 seconds, summoning a Water Dragon that hits the nearest enemy Hero within 12 range and all enemies near them, dealing 318 (+4% per level) damage and slowing their Movement Speed by 70% for 4 seconds.

13.name: Elusive Feet
13.description: When Fast Feet is triggered, gain 75 Physical Armor against the next 2 Hero Basic Attacks for 10 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%. This effect has a 10 second cooldown.

13.name: Hindering Winds
13.description: Blinding Wind also slows enemy Movement Speed by 25% for 2 seconds.

13.name: Shrink Ray
13.description: Activate to reduce an enemy Hero's damage by 50% and Movement Speed by 50% for 4 seconds.

13.name: Surging Winds
13.description: Gain 5% Ability Power for 8 seconds for every enemy hit by Blinding Wind. Additional enemies hit refresh the duration of this buff and further increase Ability Power. Stacks up to 4 times.

16.name: Safety Sprint
16.description: Increases Fast Feet's Movement Speed bonus from 10% to 20%.

16.name: Serpent Sidekick
16.description: You also gain a Cloud Serpent whenever you cast it on another ally.

16.name: Shake It Off
16.description: Being Stunned or Rooted gives 50 Armor, reducing the damage taken by 50% for 4 seconds. This effect has a 10 second cooldown.

16.name: Two For One
16.description: Increases the number of allies healed by Healing Brew to 2, but increases the cooldown by 1.5 seconds.

20.name: Double Dragon
20.description: After hitting a target with Water Dragon, another Water Dragon is summoned at the point of impact.

20.name: Jug of 1,000,000 Cups
20.description: Jug of 1,000 Cups hits two targets at a time.

20.name: Kung Fu Hustle
20.description: Ability cooldowns refresh 150% faster while Fast Feet is active.

20.name: Storm Shield
20.description: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.
